channel.title: Programs Plans on Jalves Nicacio
channel.description: Recent content in Programs Plans on Jalves Nicacio

item.title: Dekstra: Um ambiente de Aprendizagem Social para Iniciação à Aprendizagem de Programação Usando Esquemas de Concepção e Planos de Programação (2018)
item.description: This article was published in Portuguese in a Brazilian scientific journal on informatics in education. It presents the main results that emerged from the research I developed during my master’s degree.
